Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
class stSlimLogicNode< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >

Thic class template represents a SlimTree logic node entry. It is used to hold an index node or a leaf node in a memory form which allows better way to manipulate entries. It also implements means to distribute its contents between 2 nodes.

Each entry of this node can hold all information required by both nodes at same time so, the users of this node must control if it holds an index node or a leaf node.

Warning
This node will take the ownership of all object instances added to this node. It means that the object instance will be destroyed by the destructor of this class.
Version
1.0
Author
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino.nosp@m.@icm.nosp@m.c.sc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)

Documentation review.

template<class ObjectType , class EvaluatorType >
stSlimLogicNode< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::stSlimLogicNode ( stCount  maxOccupation)

Creates a new instance of this node with no objects.

Parameters
maxOccupationThe maximum number of entries.
template<class ObjectType , class EvaluatorType >
stSlimLogicNode< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::~stSlimLogicNode ( )

Disposes this instance and releases all related resources. All instances of object added to this node will also be deleted unless it is not owned by this node (see method BuyObject()).

template<class ObjectType , class EvaluatorType >
int stSlimLogicNode< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::AddEntry ( ObjectType *  obj)
inline

Adds an object to this node. This method will claim the ownership of the object instance.

Use SetEntry() to fill the other fields of each entry.

Parameters
objThe object to be added.
Returns
The entry id or -1 for error.

template<class ObjectType , class EvaluatorType >
ObjectType* stSlimLogicNode< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::BuyObject ( stCount  idx)
inline

Gets the ownership of an object associated with a given entry. This method will avoid the automatic destruction of the object instance by the destructor of this node.

This method can be used to buy the representative objects to avoid unnecessary replications.

Parameters
idxThe object index.
Returns
The pointer to the object.
